name: First Person Adventure RPG prototype 2
description:
This is just a learning project. I'm still new and still learning how to do stuff in unity. I learned a lot of stuff doing this project but I have no intention to keep working on it so I'm uploading this just for the sake of documenting it. Maybe this will inspire someone to make something, I don't know. There really isn't much to this prototype though, I just had a lot of fun modelling the weapons and building the environment.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space Bar - Jump

Control - Crouch

Left Shift - Sprint

Left Mouse Button - Attack

Right Mouse Button - Zoom

1, 2 and 3 - Change Weapons
